results.title: Australian diary. No. 052
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: fine models used in the exhibition of architecture at Sydney University; Tasmanian re-enactment of the First Session of the Federal Council of Australia and native teachers are well trained in New Guinea.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 051
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: the whaling season is in fuu swing in Western Australia; the inauguration of the Melbourne-Christchurch air service between Australia and New Zealand; machines take over the tapestry workers’ art and cattle judges have decisions put to the test at Sydney Fat Stock Show.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 049
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: Magazine items: Archery proves great sport for war veterans; “SS Borda” completed at the Brisbane ship-building yards; Melbourne girl, Anne Fraser, creates her own Little Theatre; New Guinea natives follow noble calling. Narrated by Harry Dearth.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 044
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: This newsreel features the Garden City of Launceston in Tasmania and its beautiful surrounding countryside. Giant pipes made in an Adelaide factory bring water from the Murray River to South Australia. The tourist attractions of Hayman Island on the Great Barrier Reef are shown. Hollywood comes to Australia as on the set of the film ‘Kangaroo’ made at a studio near Port Augusta, actress Maureen O’Hara is sprayed with DDT to keep off the flies!
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.title: Australian diary. No. 036
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The sculling skill of the Towns family are featured in this newsreel. Sydney holds an export packaging display, while apiarists move their bees to new blossoms. A memorial in Canberra honours the deeds of US Forces.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 035
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The rapid growth of the city of Mackay, on the coast of Queensland; a farm which, as well as ducks, breeds stud geese; a model of a building made from marble by a Gundagai man; Australian sailing-boats and the Sydney to Hobart race as the highlight of the season.
